name: Funeral Demo
description:
A short 10-15 minute demo. 

Late at night, a girl arrives at her aunt's funeral to say her last goodbye. The funeral home is secluded, surrounded only by a dark forest and a lonely road. The door closes and she is left alone with her aunt ... or maybe not with her aunt anymore, but with a demonic creature. The demon chases the girl … or is it just trying to protect her from someone? Is this a nightmare, or is it reality?

The game has a creepy atmosphere and tension. The action develops quite quickly and engages players from the beginning. Players solve mild puzzles and search for various items. 

Thank you all for videos, follows and suggestions. Appreciate it. This helps a lot to make this game better!

Follow on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sysreb/ 

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sysrebmail 

YouTube: Sysreb Games - YouTube

Warning

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
